mapper.insert: insert into msg(mno, cmno, sdmemb, mconts, mstime) values (#{customMemberNo},#{cafeMemberNo},#{sendMember},#{contents}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from msg where mno=#{customMemberNo} and cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and sdmemb=#{sendMember} and mconts=#{contents} and mstime=#{uploadTime}
mapper.select: select msg.mno, msg.cmno, msg.sdmemb, msg.mconts, msg.mstime, memb.nick, memb.name, memb.cphoto, cafe.logo, cafe.cname from msg left outer join memb on msg.mno=memb.mno left outer join cafe on msg.cmno=cafe.cmno where msg.mno=#{customMemberNo} and msg.sdmemb=#{sendMember} order by mstime desc;

select msg.mno, msg.cmno, msg.sdmemb, msg.mconts, msg.mstime, memb.nick, memb.name, memb.cphoto, cafe.logo, cafe.cname from msg left outer join memb on msg.mno=memb.mno left outer join cafe on msg.cmno=cafe.cmno where msg.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and msg.sdmemb=#{sendMember} order by mstime desc;
